name: Gun Slinvaders
description:
Counter an alien invasion is exhausting except when you're the best marksman of the West !
But first you will have to stop the train going at full speed in California. While waiting to find your good old stallion, you will have to cross all the wagons to the locomotive by firing all the bullets from your Winchesters. Go threw Wagons and shoot at aliens. You can aim, hide behind covers and headshot those intruders ! Game Design : PARMENTIER Arthur Game Design : BARLET Julien Game Programmer : SANCHES MATEUS Alexandre Game Programmer : MANACH Nicolas Game Art : KENIG Gabriel
